subject: Murders, Attempted Murders and Homicides
Basketball
organizations: Paterson Charter School for Science and Technology (Paterson, NJ)
lead_paragraph: After Armoni Sexton, 15, was fatally shot in Paterson, N.J., community leaders met with representatives of neighborhoods with a decades-old quarrel and told them: Let’s end this.
snippet: After Armoni Sexton, 15, was fatally shot in Paterson, N.J., community leaders met with representatives of neighborhoods with a decades-old quarrel and told them: Let’s end this.
